basics.name: Connor Kenneth Moore
basics.label: Technical Program Manager
basics.summary: Technical Program Manager with expertise in Model-Based Systems Engineering (MBSE), VPX/SOSA architecture, and cross-functional team leadership

work.name: Collins Aerospace
work.position: Technical Program Manager - Principal Systems Engineer
work.summary: Lead technical execution for $5M+ labor program utilizing MBSE and modular open systems architecture.
highlights: Lead technical execution for $5M+ labor program
Utilize MBSE (Cameo Systems Modeler) to architect modular open systems (SOSA™/VPX)
Enforce funding strategy separating internal vs. program funding aligned with FAR Part 12
Pioneered 'Prime-as-Architect' model reducing timeline by 6 months
Negotiated firm-fixed-price SOWs to mitigate R&D risk while maintaining <5% cost variance
Reduced operational cost by 50% through manufacturing site optimization

work.name: Collins Aerospace
work.position: Technical Program Manager - Senior Systems Engineer
work.summary: Secured $12M in contracts and led cross-functional engineering teams for mission-critical defense systems.
highlights: Secured $12M in contracts over 2 years from NATO, Taiwan, and US Armed Forces
Led cross-functional team of 5 Systems Engineers and 4 Software Squads (C#)
Delivered two mission-critical releases with MIL-STD environmental qualification
Automated qualification test events using Python

work.name: Collins Aerospace
work.summary: Provided on-site integration support for international military platforms with focus on RF systems and export compliance.
highlights: Provided on-site integration support for 12+ international military platforms
Resolved complex RF and waveform configuration issues
Developed core manufacturing expertise (X-Ray, AOI, flying probe testing)
